TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SyndicationCategory extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示新聞訂閱摘要分類的類別。

span.span: A class that represents the category of a syndication feed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分類可讓您指派一或多個能夠用來搜尋資訊的關鍵字。A category allows you to assign one or more keywords that can be used to search for information. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何建立 以及新增具有 的 。The following code shows how to create a and add a with a . summary.span: 取得這個分類的屬性延伸。

The attribute extensions for this category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新聞訂閱物件模型可讓您新增自訂屬性至 執行個體。The syndication object model allows you to add custom attributes to a instance. 屬性延伸是指未由 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 規格定義的自訂屬性，Attribute extensions are custom attributes that are not defined by the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 這些屬性會序列化為 `` 項目的屬性。They are serialized as an attribute of the `` element.

summary.span: 取得這個分類的項目延伸。

span.span: Gets the element extensions for this category.
A collection of element extensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目延伸是指 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 規格中未指定的有效 XML 項目。Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specification. 假設某個有效 XML 項目的命名空間與封入命名空間不同，您便可將任何此類項目新增為延伸。You can add any valid XML element as an extension, provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace. ## Examples 下列 XML 會示範具有自訂項目的 如何序列化為 Atom 1.0。The following XML shows how a with a custom element is serialized to Atom 1.0. ``` Some text ``` > [!NOTE] > 執行個體內的自訂項目並未序列化為 RSS 2.0。Custom elements within instances are not serialized to RSS 2.0.

The label of the category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當序列化至 Atom 1.0 時，寫入`label`屬性 <`category`> 項目。When serialized to Atom 1.0, the is written to the `label` attribute of the <`category`> element. 沒有序列化為 RSS 2.0。 is not serialized to RSS 2.0. ## Examples 下列 XML 會示範 屬性如何序列化為 Atom 1.0。The following XML shows how the property is serialized to Atom 1.0. ``` ```

span.span: Gets and sets the scheme of the category.
The scheme of the category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當序列化至 Atom 1.0 時，屬性寫入`scheme`屬性 <`category`> 項目。When serialized to Atom 1.0, the property is written to the `scheme` attribute of the <`category`> element. 當序列化至 RSS 2.0 時，屬性寫入`domain`屬性 <`category`> 項目。When serialized to RSS 2.0, the property is written to the `domain` attribute of the <`category`> element. ## Examples 下列 XML 會示範 屬性如何序列化為 Atom 1.0。The following XML shows how the property is serialized to Atom 1.0. ``` ``` 下列 XML 會說明 屬性如何序列化為 RSS 2.0。The following XML shows how the property is serialized to RSS 2.0. ``` FeedCategory ```

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual bool TryParseAttribute (string name, string ns, string value, string version);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool TryParseAttribute(string name, string ns, string value, string version) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Function TryParseAttribute (name As String, ns As String, value As String, version As String) As Boolean
protected public: virtual bool TryParseAttribute(System::String ^ name, System::String ^ ns, System::String ^ value, System::String ^ version);
abstract member TryParseAttribute : string * string * string * string -> bool override this.TryParseAttribute : string * string * string * string -> bool

span.span: The name of the element.
The namespace of the element.
The attribute to parse.

param.name: version
param.span: 剖析時要使用的新聞訂閱版本。

span.span: The syndication version to use when parsing.
Attempts to parse an attribute extension.

returns.span: 指定是否已成功剖析屬性延伸的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether the attribute extension was parsed successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性延伸是指未由 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 規格定義的自訂屬性，Attribute extensions are custom attributes that are not defined by the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 這些屬性會序列化為 `` 項目的屬性。They are serialized as an attribute of the `` element. 這個方法是延伸點，可讓您處理自訂屬性延伸的還原序列化作業。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the deserialization of a custom attribute extension. 若要這麼做，您可以從 衍生類別，並且覆寫這個方法。To do this, derive a class from and override this method. 這個方法是針對所有無法辨識的屬性延伸來呼叫。This method is called for all unrecognized attribute extensions.

exception.span: 在讀取期間遇到無效的 XML。

span.span: Invalid XML encountered during read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目延伸是指 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 規格中未指定的有效 XML 項目。Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 假設某個有效 XML 項目的命名空間與封入命名空間不同，您便可將任何此類項目新增為延伸。You can add any valid XML element as an extension, provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace. 這個方法是延伸點，可讓您處理自訂項目延伸的還原序列化作業。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the deserialization of a custom element extension. 若要這麼做，您可以從 衍生類別，並且覆寫這個方法。To do this, derive a class from and override this method. 這個方法是針對所有無法辨識的屬性延伸來呼叫。This method is called for all unrecognized attribute extensions.

exception.span: 在讀取期間遇到無效的 XML。

span.span: Invalid XML encountered during read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目延伸是指 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 規格中未指定的有效 XML 項目。Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specification. 假設某個有效 XML 項目的命名空間與封入命名空間不同，您便可將任何此類項目新增為延伸。You can add any valid XML element as an extension, provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace. 這個方法是擴充點，可讓您處理自訂項目延伸的序列化作業。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the serialization of custom element extensions. 若要這麼做，您可以從 衍生類別，並且覆寫這個方法。To do this, derive a class from and override this method. 這個方法是針對所有無法辨識的項目延伸來呼叫。This method is called for all unrecognized element extensions.
